name: part_007
file: tmp_【#不知火フレア3D新ビジュアルお披露目】お待たせ！！君に早く会いたかったよ！【不知火フレア⧸ホロライブ】 [BB2zYMB-1G4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Flare and the members of Shiraken discuss the rules for the upcoming 'freedom' performance and introduce the next song.
Shiraken performs the song 'H.P.S.J.' while interacting freely with the camera.
The members catch their breath after the high-energy performance and conclude the live segment.

subtitles.original: はい！ということで、
subtitles.english: Alright! So,

subtitles.original: 次の曲に行きたいんですけど、
subtitles.english: I'd like to move on to the next song.

subtitles.original: 次の曲はね、そういう意味も含めて、ま、フリーダムにやっていきたいということで、
subtitles.english: For the next song, I want us to perform it with a sense of freedom,

subtitles.original: ま、ここにね、カメラを設置いたしましたんで、
subtitles.english: so I've set up a camera here.

subtitles.original: ここでね、あの、歌いたい人、自分の...
subtitles.english: Here, for those who want to sing, their own...

subtitles.original: はい、っていう感じで、あの、自分のパートとか、
subtitles.english: Yes, like that. During your parts,

subtitles.original: あの、今出たい！って思った時は、
subtitles.english: or when you feel like coming out,

subtitles.original: あの、自分から前に出てください。
subtitles.english: please come forward on your own.

subtitles.original: で、あの、このカメラがちょっと楽しくなったり気持ちよくなってきたりしたら、
subtitles.english: And if this camera gets into the mood and starts having fun,

subtitles.original: 動いてくれるかもしれません。
subtitles.english: it might even start moving.

subtitles.original: あ、そうそう、こんな感じでね。
subtitles.english: Oh, exactly, like this.

subtitles.original: おーおーおー、動いてくれることも、あるかもしれませんのでね。
subtitles.english: Whoa, it might just start moving around like this.

subtitles.original: 皆さん、あの、全力でやってくださいね！
subtitles.english: Everyone, please give it your all!

subtitles.original: ということでね、じゃあちょっと、次の曲最後になりますが...
subtitles.english: Alright then, the next song will be our last...

subtitles.original: さ、もう一曲ね、行きたいと思います！
subtitles.english: So, I'd like to do one more song!

subtitles.original: じゃあみんな、ちょっと、チェケラ行きますか！
subtitles.english: Alright everyone, shall we get checking it out?

subtitles.original: さ、最初に声を上げるのは誰だーい！？
subtitles.english: Now, who's going to be the first to raise their voice!?

subtitles.original: 叫びてぇー！
subtitles.english: I wanna shout it out!

subtitles.original: はい、いらっしゃいませー！
subtitles.english: Yes, welcome to the show!

subtitles.original: 叫びてぇ奴は集まれ 皆で爆笑
subtitles.english: If you wanna shout, gather 'round! Everyone, laugh it up!

subtitles.original: 爆笑！
subtitles.english: Laugh it up!

subtitles.original: Everybody say ho!
subtitles.english: Everybody say ho!

subtitles.original: Ho! Hip hop step jump!
subtitles.english: Ho! Hip hop step jump!

subtitles.original: 叫びてぇ奴は集まれ 皆で爆笑
subtitles.english: If you wanna shout, gather 'round! Everyone, laugh it up!

subtitles.original: 爆笑！
subtitles.english: Laugh it up!

subtitles.original: Everybody say ho!
subtitles.english: Everybody say ho!

subtitles.original: Ho! Hip hop step jump!
subtitles.english: Ho! Hip hop step jump!

subtitles.original: はいはい、皆さん合言葉 みんなで手を挙げ万歳！
subtitles.english: Alright, here's our password! Everyone, raise your hands and 'Banzai'!

subtitles.original: 万歳！
subtitles.english: Banzai!

subtitles.original: 音に乗って楽しみたい奴 Keep on jammin'!
subtitles.english: If you wanna ride the beat and have fun, keep on jammin'!

subtitles.original: Yes! Keep on keep on jammin'!
subtitles.english: Yes! Keep on keep on jammin'!

subtitles.original: 怒ったり笑ったり 泣いたりして
subtitles.english: Getting angry, laughing, or crying,

subtitles.original: 笑ったり！
subtitles.english: Laughing!

subtitles.original: 長い旅 過ぎてく Days
subtitles.english: our long journey goes on through the days.

subtitles.original: Take off!
subtitles.english: Take off!

subtitles.original: 乗り遅れちゃ遅刻だよ
subtitles.english: If you miss the start, you're late!

subtitles.original: テンションゲージ上げる
subtitles.english: Raise that tension gauge!

subtitles.original: 仲間たちと盛り上げる Party 羽目外し Crazy everybody!
subtitles.english: Liven up the party with friends! Cut loose, crazy everybody!

subtitles.original: Jump I'm ready yeah!
subtitles.english: Jump, I'm ready, yeah!

subtitles.original: Jump I'm ready yeah!
subtitles.english: Jump, I'm ready, yeah!

subtitles.original: Jump I'm ready yeah!
subtitles.english: Jump, I'm ready, yeah!

subtitles.original: Hip hop step jumping!
subtitles.english: Hip hop step jumping!

subtitles.original: いやー、ありがとうございましたー！
subtitles.english: Wow, thank you so much!

subtitles.original: いぇーい！楽しかったー！チェケラー！チェケラー！
subtitles.english: Yay! That was fun! Chekera! Chekera!

subtitles.original: お忙しいところね、
subtitles.english: In the midst of your busy schedules,

subtitles.original: お集まりいただきありがとうございました！
subtitles.english: thank you so much for gathering here!

subtitles.original: いえいえ、こちらこそ！
subtitles.english: Not at all, the pleasure is ours!

subtitles.original: もうね、でも君たちともうね...
subtitles.english: But really, with you guys...

subtitles.original: 歌はやってられん！
subtitles.english: I can't keep singing!

subtitles.original: なんでー！？なんでー！？
subtitles.english: Why!? Why!?

subtitles.original: お前が言うなよ！ｗ
subtitles.english: You're the one to talk! lol

subtitles.original: 疲れたからね、もう！
subtitles.english: Because I'm exhausted!

subtitles.original: お疲れ様です。ちょっとね、不知火建設で歌はこれで一旦終わり。に。しまして...
subtitles.english: Good job everyone. For now, we'll wrap up the Shiranui Construction singing section...

subtitles.original: えー！
subtitles.english: Ehhh!
